text.name: ATB_tip_worker
text.text: Number of available AI workers. 0 will disable all AI workers (Default: 10)

text.name: ATB_tip_storeActive
text.text: Enable/disable Store for all players (Default: on)

text.name: ATB_tip_storeOpenTime
text.text: Daily opening hour of the shop (Default: 0:00)

text.name: ATB_tip_storeCloseTime
text.text: Daily closing hour of the shop (Default: 24:00)

text.name: ATB_tip_storeLeasing
text.text: Enable/disable vehicle leasing in store. (Default: on)

text.name: ATB_tip_loanMin
text.text: Set minimum loan amount. Set both to 0 to disable loan. (Default: 500,000)

text.name: ATB_tip_loanMax
text.text: Must be equal or higher than the minimum amount. (Default: 3,000,000)

text.name: ATB_tip_contractLimit
text.text: Set max number of parallel contracts per farm. (Default: 3)

text.name: ATB_tip_missionsLeasing
text.text: Enable/disable vehicle leasing in missions. (Default: on)

text.name: ATB_storeDialogClosed
text.text: The store is currently closed. It will open at %d:00
